returns.wrappedNative_: - The wrapped native token which can be used for CCIP fees.

returns.tokens: - Returns a list of token addresses that are supported for cross-chain transfers by the simulator.

returns.supported: - Returns true if `chainSelector` is supported by the simulator.

params.amount: - The amount of LINK tokens to send.
params.to: - The address to which LINK tokens are to be sent.

returns.success: - Returns `true` if the transfer of tokens was successful, otherwise `false`.

params.tokenAddress: - The address of the token to add to the list of supported tokens.

configuration().notice: Returns configuration details for pre-deployed contracts and services needed for local CCIP simulations.

getSupportedTokens(uint64).notice: Gets a list of token addresses that are supported for cross-chain transfers by the simulator.

isChainSupported(uint64).notice: Checks whether the provided `chainSelector` is supported by the simulator.

requestLinkFromFaucet(address,uint256).notice: Requests LINK tokens from the faucet. The provided amount of tokens are transferred to provided destination address.

supportNewToken(address).notice: Allows user to support any new token, besides CCIP BnM and CCIP LnM, for cross-chain transfers.
